name: usergroups.create
desc: This method is used to create a user group.

name.desc: A name for the user group. Must be unique among user groups.

handle.desc: A mention handle. Must be unique among channels, users and user groups.

description.desc: A short description of the user group.

channels.desc: A comma separated string of encoded channel IDs for which the user group uses as a default.

include_count.desc: Include the number of users in each user group.

errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
errors.user_is_restricted: This method cannot be called by a restricted user or single channel guest.
errors.user_is_ultra_restricted: This method cannot be called by a single channel guest.
